00322 #define UA_SERVER_SETATTRIBUTE_DECL(ATTRIBUTE, ATTRIBUTEID, TYPE) \
00323   static inline UA_StatusCode UA_Server_setNodeAttribute_##ATTRIBUTE(UA_Server *server, const UA_NodeId nodeId, const TYPE value) { \
00324     return UA_Server_setNodeAttribute(server, nodeId, ATTRIBUTEID, (const void *)&value); \
00325   }

00392 typedef struct {
00393     enum {
00394         UA_JOBTYPE_NOTHING,
00395         UA_JOBTYPE_DETACHCONNECTION,
00396         UA_JOBTYPE_BINARYMESSAGE,
00397         UA_JOBTYPE_METHODCALL,
00398         UA_JOBTYPE_DELAYEDMETHODCALL,
00399     } type;
00400     union {
00401         UA_Connection *closeConnection;
00402         struct {
00403             UA_Connection *connection;
00404             UA_ByteString message;
00405         } binaryMessage;
00406         struct {
00407             void *data;
00408             void (*method)(UA_Server *server, void *data);
00409         } methodCall;
00410     } job;
00411 } UA_Job;
